mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_member (chat, member, chat_auth, last_read_at, created_at) VALUES (#{chat.id}, #{member.id}, #{chatAuth}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT cm.*, m.name AS member_name, m.email AS member_email, m.university AS member_university, c.title AS chat_title, c.created_at AS chat_created_at, c.updated_at AS chat_updated_at, i.id AS item_id, i.title AS item_title, i.description AS item_description, i.image_url AS item_image_url, i.status AS item_status, i.auction AS item_auction, i.price AS item_price, i.created_at AS item_created_at, i.updated_at AS item_updated_at, s.id AS seller_id, s.name AS seller_name, s.email AS seller_email, s.university AS seller_university FROM chat_member cm JOIN member m ON cm.member = m.id JOIN chat c ON cm.chat = c.id JOIN item i ON c.item = i.id JOIN member s ON i.seller = s.id WHERE cm.member = #{memberId}
